translation: "In the east, he says, 'Nāgasamyak-saṃdhara (a) Indradhara (b) (2) samaṇḍala (b) he says, 'Nāgasamyak-saṃdhara (b) he says, 'Nāgasamyak-saṃdhara (b) samaṇḍala (b) he says.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)阿仡曩(二合)曳(二)娑嚩(二合)賀南方焰摩天真言曰。
translation: "In the name of the fire deity of the southeast, Mokṣamattha-buddhānā (1) agla-nāga-rāja (2) sāva-rāja (2) hath the true words.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)焰摩野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀西南方羅剎主天真言曰。
translation: "In the southwest, the god Rāṣṭrapāla truly says.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)銘伽舍曩野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀西方水天真言曰。
translation: "In the past, he spoke truly, 'Samantabhadra-buddhânanda (a) mingashyananda (b) sarva (dichotomy) to the west of the Water God,' and he said.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)嚩嚕拏野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀西北方風天真言曰。
translation: "In the past, he said, 'Samantabhadra-buddhânanda (1) 'Varuṇa' (2) 'Saṃva' (2) he said to the Wind God of the northwest.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)嚩野吠(二)娑嚩(二合)賀北方毘沙門天真言曰。
translation: "In ancient times, he spoke truly, 'Samantabhadra-buddhânanda (a) varuṇa (b) sahāva (dichotomy) to the north of the Vaiśravaṇa Heaven.'

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)吠室囉末拏野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀東北方伊舍那天真言曰。
translation: "In ancient times, the Trāyastriṃśa Heaven verbalized (1) Vaiśravaṇa (2) Saṃvaṇa (2) to the northeast of Vaiśravaṇa.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)伊舍娜野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀上方梵天真言曰。
translation: "The verbal expression for the Brahma Heaven above Īśāna (1) Śāntānano (2) Śaṭṭhā (2) He says.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿哆沒馱南(一)沒囉(二合)憾麼(二合)野(二)娑嚩(二合)賀下方地天真言曰。
translation: "In ancient times, the Trāyastriṃśa Buddha's name was (1) Brāhmaṇḍa (2) śramaṇa (2) sahāva (2) ha, and the True Word of the Earth Gods below him said.

source_sentence: 本明誦三遍安於本方位。

source_sentence: 次以飯供養先燒於乳飯。

source_sentence: 各令塗手執華候念讚瀉酥訖。

source_sentence: 往火壇禮拜表供養圓滿。
